Description:
Model
Brand: Enermax
Series: AQUAFUSION 360
Model: ELC-AQF360-SQA
Type: Liquid Cooling System


Block
Block Compatibility: Intel LGA 2066 / 2011(-3) Square ILM / 1700 / 1366 / 1200 / 115x AMD AM5 / AM4 / AM3(+) / AM2(+) / FM2(+) / FM1
Block Material: Nickel plated copper


Pump
Pump Bearing: Ceramic bearing


Radiator
Radiator Size: 394.00 x 120.00 x 27.00 mm
Radiator Material: Aluminum


Fan
Fan Size: 3 Fan Slots (120 mm)
Fan Dim.: 120.00 x 120.00 x 26.00 mm
Fan RPM: 500 - 2,000 RPM
Fan Air Flow: 39 - 79.8 CFM
Fan Noise: 17 - 32.6 dBA
Fan Connector: 4 pin PWM (GND/12V/Tacho/PWM)
Color: Black
LED Color: ARGB


Tube
Tube Dim.: Length: 400mm
Tube Material: Rubber (Polyamide)


Features
Features: AQUAFUSION is an all-in-one CPU liquid cooler with individually addressable RGB LEDs.The RGB water block is equipped with a 3D Layer Design with Aurabelt for unique lighting effects.Together with ENERMAX SquA RGB addressable fans, AQUAFUSION can create dynamic visual experience via motherboard software or included control box.The ENERMAX SquA RGB fans create a strong centred air pressure through the Vortex Frame Design to quickly dissipate heat from the radiator.Thanks to ENERMAX's patented Dual-Chamber Design, Central Coolant Inlet (CCI) and Shunt-Channel Technology (SCT) the cooler achieves faster heat transfer and extended lifetime.AQUAFUSION is a one of a kind cooling solution for custom gaming rigs or stunning system builds for Intel and AMD CPUs.
Label: D.Líquida Enermax AQUAFUSION 360 ARGB
